welcome_body: Sara is with you on your motherhood journey.
feeding_tracking_body: Breastfeeding, formula, bottle... Easily record every meal.
sleep_schedule_body: Track your baby's sleep hours and quality. Create a healthier sleep routine.
have_an_account: Don’t have an account? Sign Up
already_have_an_account_sign_in: Already have an account? Sign In
lets_fill_in_your_baby_information: Let’s Fill in Your Baby’s Information
set_your_birthday_or_due_date: Set your Birthday or Due Date
do_not_miss_a_moment: Ready to Start Your Baby's Journey?
get_gentle_reminders: Your app is all set up! Track sleep, feedings, and milestones with ease. Let's begin this wonderful journey together!
first_look_desc: Baby opens their eyes and looks around for the first time.
first_response_sound_desc: Baby reacts to a sudden sound.
first_grasp_reflex_desc: Baby instinctively curls fingers around an object placed in their palm.
lift_head_desc: Baby briefly lifts their head while on their tummy.
first_cuddle_reaction_desc: Baby shows a positive reaction to being cuddled.
follow_object_desc: Baby's eyes follow a moving object.
hand_to_mouth_desc: Baby brings their hand to their mouth.
first_babbling_sounds_desc: Baby starts making consonant-vowel sounds like 'ba' or 'ga'.
recognize_parent_voice_desc: Baby reacts differently to their parent's voice.
roll_over_desc: Baby rolls from tummy to back or back to tummy.
respond_smile_desc: Baby smiles back when someone smiles at them.
laugh_out_loud_desc: Baby expresses joy with loud laughter.
first_squeal_of_joy_desc: Baby makes a high-pitched sound to show happiness.
reach_for_toys_desc: Baby reaches out to grab toys.
grab_parents_finger_desc: Baby intentionally grabs and holds onto a finger.
mirror_smile_desc: Baby smiles when looking in a mirror.
first_attempt_to_sit_desc: Baby tries to sit up with minimal support.
sit_with_support_desc: Baby can sit upright when supported.
babbling_desc: Baby engages in more complex babbling sounds.
first_solid_food_desc: Baby tries solid food for the first time.
first_time_eating_from_spoon_desc: Baby eats food from a spoon for the first time.
transfer_objects_desc: Baby can move an object from one hand to the other.
responds_name_desc: Baby reacts when their name is called.
play_with_toys_desc: Baby interacts with toys in a simple way.
peekaboo_reaction_desc: Baby shows excitement or understanding during a peekaboo game.
first_gum_eruption_desc: Baby's first tooth starts to come in.
stranger_anxiety_desc: Baby shows signs of being uneasy around unfamiliar people.
first_time_wave_desc: Baby makes a waving gesture for the first time.
recognize_name_desc: Baby clearly understands and reacts to their name.
first_clapping_attempt_desc: Baby tries to clap their hands together.
crawl_desc: Baby moves around on their hands and knees or tummy.
pincher_grasp_desc: Baby can grasp small objects between their thumb and index finger.
dance_to_music_desc: Baby moves their body in response to music.
understand_simple_words_desc: Baby shows understanding of basic words like 'mama', 'dada', or 'bye-bye'.
first_time_pulling_to_stand_desc: Baby uses furniture or other supports to pull themselves up to a standing position.
stand_with_support_desc: Baby can stand while holding onto something for support.
wave_bye_desc: Baby waves their hand to say goodbye.
first_words_try_desc: Baby attempts to say their first recognizable words.
emotional_reaction_desc: Baby shows clear emotional responses like joy, sadness, or frustration.
first_cruising_along_furniture_desc: Baby moves sideways while holding onto furniture.
favorite_toy_desc: Baby shows a clear preference for a particular toy.
first_imitation_of_actions_desc: Baby copies simple actions they see.
first_steps_desc: Baby takes their first independent steps.
clap_hands_desc: Baby can clap their hands on command or to express excitement.
first_real_word_desc: Baby says their first word with clear meaning.
blow_candle_desc: Baby attempts to blow out a candle.
stack_blocks_desc: Baby can stack a few blocks on top of each other.
use_spoon_desc: Baby tries to feed themselves with a spoon.
first_scribble_desc: Baby makes their first marks with a crayon or pencil.
point_objects_desc: Baby points to things they want or are interested in.
first_steps_outside_desc: Baby takes their first steps outdoors.
understand_two_step_commands_desc: Baby can follow two simple instructions given together.
form_sentences_desc: Baby starts putting two or more words together to form simple sentences.
brush_teeth_desc: Baby attempts to brush their own teeth with help.
first_friend_desc: Baby shows a special connection with another child.
first_sleepover_desc: Baby sleeps away from home for the first time.
name_body_parts_desc: Baby can identify and name some body parts.
forgot_password_information: No worries! Enter your email below and we’ll send you a link to reset your password.
failure_forgot_password:
We couldn’t find an account with that email.
Please check and try again.
baby_profile_saved_body: Your baby's information has been saved successfully.
welcome_back_body: You're all set. Let's get started!
join_a_family_body: Are you new to Sara or joining a family?
start_a_new_journey_with_sara: Start a new journey with Sara
change_password_description: For security reasons, you can set a new password for your account. Please enter and confirm your new password below.
you_have_not_added_any_caregivers_yet: You haven\'t added any caregivers yet.
share_sara_baby_with_your_friends: Share Sara Baby with Your Friends
rate_sara_baby_on_the_app_store: Rate Sara Baby on the App Store
tap_to_upload_your_baby_photo: Tap to Upload Your Baby’s Photo
add_caregiver_page_body_info: Enter the caregiver’s name and email. They can join your baby’s profile by selecting Join Family on the login screen.
edit_caregiver_page_info: Removing this caregiver will revoke their access to your family. They will no longer be able to view baby-related data.
join_a_family_info: Join To join a family, use the email address you were invited with Family
please_enter_start_end_time_or_amount: Please enter start, end time or amount,
already_added_body: This tooth has already been tracked. Please review the teething timeline.
instruction_rice_porridge_1: Mix rice flour and water in a small pot.
instruction_rice_porridge_4: Let cool and add breast milk if desired.
instruction_banana_puree_1: Peel and mash banana with a fork or blender.
instruction_banana_puree_2: If too thick, add 1-2 teaspoons of breast milk/water.
instruction_carrot_soup_2: Boil in water for 10-12 minutes until soft.
instruction_zucchini_puree_1: Steam or boil peeled zucchini for 8-10 minutes.
instruction_mashed_potatoes_2: Mash with breast milk/water for smooth consistency.
instruction_pear_puree_1: Steam pear for 5 minutes to soften.
instruction_vegetable_bulgur_pilaf_2: Sauté with bulgur in oil for 1 minute.
instruction_vegetable_bulgur_pilaf_3: Add 1 tea cup water and cook for 10 minutes.
instruction_oatmeal_porridge_2: Simmer for 5 minutes on low heat.
instruction_lentil_puree_1: Wash and boil lentils for 15 minutes.
instruction_avocado_banana_puree_1: Mash avocado and banana with fork.
instruction_pumpkin_soup_1: Dice and boil pumpkin for 10 minutes.
instruction_chicken_vegetable_stew_2: Add 1 tea cup water and cook for 10 minutes.
instruction_chicken_vegetable_stew_3: Add chicken and cook 2 more minutes.
instruction_fruit_pancakes_2: Cook small pancakes (2 minutes per side).
instruction_zucchini_ground_meat_2: Cook with meat and tomato for 10 minutes.
instruction_mini_meatballs_1: Mix ingredients and form small meatballs.
instruction_vegetable_tarhana_soup_2: Simmer for 5 minutes on low heat.
instruction_vegetable_pasta_2: Cook peas and corn for 5 minutes.
instruction_pumpkin_cake_3: Bake in mold at 180°C for 20 minutes.
instruction_noodles_yogurt_2: Mix with yogurt and sprinkle mint.
instruction_rice_meat_vegetables_2: Add rice and 1 cup water to cook.
note_rice_porridge_thin: For first-time eaters, prepare with a thinner consistency.
note_banana_fibers: Remove white fibers from banana if present.
note_carrot_olive_oil: Add olive oil to increase nutritional value.
note_molasses_limit: Limit molasses to 1 tsp/day due to iron content.
note_oatmeal_flavor: Can flavor with cinnamon or molasses.
note_avocado_lemon: Add lemon juice to prevent avocado browning.
note_broccoli_olive_oil: Serve with olive oil or yogurt.
note_zucchini_chicken_option: Can use chicken instead of meat.
faq_subtitle: Find answers to your questions about using Baby Sara.
faq_reset_password_question: I forgot my password, what should I do?
faq_reset_password_answer: On the sign-in screen, tap 'Forgot Password' to receive a reset email.
faq_multiple_babies_question: Can I add more than one baby?
faq_multiple_babies_answer: Yes! You can create profiles for multiple babies and track each one individually.
faq_track_activities_question: How do I track baby activities?
faq_track_activities_answer: You can easily log feeding, sleep, pumping, medications, and milestones. Just tap the '+' button on the home screen.
faq_recipes_feature_answer: Discover healthy, age-appropriate recipes for your baby and follow step-by-step instructions.
faq_sounds_feature_question: How can I use baby background sounds?
faq_sounds_feature_answer: Go to the 'Sounds' section, select a sound, and play it. The sounds loop automatically to create a calming environment.
faq_data_security_answer: Yes! Baby Sara uses Firebase to securely store all your data.
faq_data_backup_question: How can I back up my app data?
faq_data_backup_answer: Your data is automatically stored in the cloud. If you reinstall the app or switch devices, just log in to access your data.
faq_contact_support_answer: Reach out through the 'Support' section in the app or email us at support@babysara.app.
faq_caregiver_answer: A caregiver is someone who helps track your baby’s activities—like your partner, family member, or babysitter.
faq_add_caregiver_question: How do I add a caregiver?
faq_add_caregiver_answer: Go to 'Profile' > 'Add Caregiver'. Enter their email to invite them. Once they accept, they can view and manage the baby’s activities.
faq_what_is_baby_sara_answer: Baby Sara helps you track your baby’s growth journey. You can log feedings, sleep, pumping, medications, and milestones, explore age-appropriate recipes, play calming sounds, add multiple babies, share care with caregivers, and keep your data safe in the cloud.
legal_subtitle: Review the important information about your account and data.
legal_notice_text: By using the Baby Sara app, you agree to the terms and policies outlined below. Please review them carefully.
terms_of_service_body: Our Terms of Service explain the rules and guidelines for using Baby Sara, including user responsibilities, account management, and content usage.
privacy_policy_body: We are committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and store your personal data.
data_security_body: We use encryption and secure practices to ensure your data is safe and protected. Baby Sara stores your information securely using Firebase infrastructure.
contact_support_body: If you have any questions or need assistance, our team is ready to help. You can reach us by email at support@babysara.app.
disclaimer_body: Baby Sara is intended as a tool to help track baby activities and is not a substitute for medical advice. Always consult a healthcare professional for health-related questions.
commitment_text: We are dedicated to creating a safe, supportive, and secure environment for parents and caregivers. Your trust is important to us.
